newsitem.title: USA: Paul-Son to form non-gaming joint venture.
newsitem.headline: Paul-Son to form non-gaming joint venture.

text.p: Paul-Son Gaming Corp on Wednesday said it signed a letter of intent with DeBartolo Entertainment to form a joint venture to pursue marketing opportunities outside the gaming industry.
The letter of intent calls for a definitive agreement within 30 days.

Paul-Son would serve as the exclusive manufacturer and sole supplier of high-quality non-gaming commemorative chips, playing cards and most other non-gaming products to be marketed by the joint venture.
Paul-Son will own 50 percent of the joint venture, nominate half of its board of directors, and select with DeBartolo the chief executive officer.
Paul-Son shares closed up 3/8 at a year high of 14-1/8.
